author: Staff Reporter
text:
Applications are invited for admission to January 2017-term Class VIII at the Rashtriya Indian Military College at Dehradun in Uttarakhand by March 31.

A press release said that only boys could apply for the admission and students who appear for the entrance examination should not be aged below eleven-and-a-half years and should not have attained the age of 13 years as on January 1, 2017.

Written examinations cover English, mathematics and general knowledge. It will be held on June 1 and 2 at select centres including Chennai.

The interview will be held on October 4 for candidates who have cleared the written examination.

Prospectus-cum-applications forms with a set of old question papers can be obtained by speed post by sending a demand draft of Rs. 490 for general candidates and Rs. 435 for SC/ST candidates along with caste certificates drawn in favour of The Commandant, Rashtriya Indian Military College, Dehradun, payable at State Bank of India, Tel Bhavan, Dehradun (Bank Code-01576), Uttarakhand.

Duly filled-in forms should be sent to the Controller of Examinations, Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission, Frazer Bridge Road, VOC Nagar, Chennai-3, by March 31. Details could be ascertained onwww.tnpsc.gov.inand www.rimc.org, the press release adds.
title: Applications invited
